title: The Dilemma With Dong From 'Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt'
teaser: Dong's character in the show Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt has raised eyebrows. NPR's Rachel Martin talks to NPR's Kat Chow about whether his character pushes against stereotypes, or reinforces them.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
